CustomField.description: When checked, allows the LLM to request multiple independent tool executions in a single turn. This can improve performance for complex user requests but requires the backend to handle potential governor limit stacking. Leave unchecked for simpler, sequential tool execution.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable this to allow the AI to perform multiple actions at once (e.g., 'find a contact AND get their recent cases'). Only enable for agents whose synchronous tools are lightweight and unlikely to exceed governor limits when combined in a single transaction.
CustomField.label: Enable Parallel Tool Calling
